alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:52PM CDT until June 06 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Central Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Weston, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leavenworth, Lansing, Platte City, Weston, Tracy, Farley, Fort Leavenworth, East Leavenworth, Stillings and Beverly. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 17 and 20. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
